alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 31 at 11:18AM CDT until September 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ TO 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM CDT /noon MDT/ to 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Friday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton and Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that start Friday afternoon will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning or any activity that involves sparks is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
